sentences.en: Almost all of my company's products can be seen in this showroom.
sentences.cn: 我们公司所有的产品几乎都可以在这陈列室里看到.

sentences.en: Certainly. But they are in the showroom.
sentences.cn: 可以. 不过,它们在展厅里.

sentences.en: Free gifts would be offered to customer who visit our showroom.
sentences.cn: 每位亲临本中心展示室参观之顾客,可免费获得精美赠品一份.

sentences.en: Further information is available from your local electricity showroom.
sentences.cn: 想要获得更多信息可以咨询当地的电器展销厅。

sentences.en: In Britain a showroom is called a salesroom.
Is your showroom far from here?
sentences.cn: 你们展示间离此地远 吗 ?

sentences.en: Our entire range of cars is now on view at your local showroom.
sentences.cn: 我们各种型号的汽车现正在贵区陈列室里展出.

sentences.en: Police restored the stolen jewels to the showroom.
sentences.cn: 警方将被盗的珠宝交还给了陈列室.

sentences.en: Send them to Manukian, even the showroom bike.
sentences.cn: 把他们送到马努奇安那里, 包括陈列品.

sentences.en: The boys drooled over the sports cars in the showroom.
sentences.cn: 那些男孩给陈列室里的跑车迷住了.

sentences.en: There are several luxurious cars in the automobile dealer's showroom.
sentences.cn: 这家汽车销售商的展室中有几款豪华轿车.

sentences.en: We got a lot of people into the showroom, and we sold a lot of cars.
sentences.cn: 许多人一下子都涌到我们的展销室来, 我们因此而销售了许多车子.

sentences.en: We invited a select group of fifty - two Detroit area couples to our car styling showroom.
sentences.cn: 我们挑选了底特律地区一组52对夫妇,请他们到我们的汽车款式陈列室.

sentences.en: We'll see what we can do. Please follow me to our showroom first.
sentences.cn: 我们会尽力帮忙的. 请先到样品陈列室参观.

sentences.en: Would you mind showing me your showroom?
sentences.cn: 您可以带我参观一下展室 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: a large room where you can look at things that are for sale, such as cars or electrical goods
